eu.opends.niftyGui

Class KeyMappingGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.niftyGui.KeyMappingGUI

  • public class KeyMappingGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the key mapping and graphic settings GUI. It provides methods to open and close, initialize and destroy the GUI and to open a given tab of the GUI.
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  KeyMappingGUI.GuiLayer
      This enum contains all tabs of the key mapping and graphic settings GUI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyMappingGUI(SimulationBasics sim)
      Creates a new instance of the key mapping and graphic settings GUI.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.lessvoid.nifty.Nifty getNifty()
      Returns Nifty element of the key mapping and graphic settings GUI.
      void hideDialog()
      Hides key mapping and graphic settings GUI.
      void openLayer(KeyMappingGUI.GuiLayer selectedLayer)
      Changes over to the given layer of the (already opened) key mapping and graphic settings GUI.
      void showDialog()
      Shows key mapping and graphic settings GUI.
      void toggleDialog()
      Toggles visibility of the key mapping and graphic settings GUI.
